verbose_text: The autophagy inhibitor chloroquine alone did not result in a significant disturbance of Bax / Bcl-2 ratio (XREF_FIG); importantly, the simultaneous combination of trastuzumab and chloroquine increased expression of Bax while reducing that of Bcl-2, which resulted in the synergistic increase in Bax / Bcl-2 ratio in JIMT-1 tumors (XREF_FIG).
evidence: Bax while reducing that of Bcl-2
